intro: Staphidium confertiflorum, commonly known as the dense-flowered staphidium, is a species of flowering plant belonging to the family Rhamnaceae. It is characterized by its compact growth habit and clusters of small, greenish-yellow flowers. The plant produces small, elliptical leaves that are often arranged in opposite pairs along the stems. It typically thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and specialized species in its native range.
